thread.section_title: RushMyPassport.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RushMyPassport.com | rushmypassport.com | 5 of 151
thread.title: Teresa Sundelius

author: Teresa Sundelius
title: Teresa Sundelius
text: My husband and I decided to take the kids on a surprise vacation to Turks and Caicos but we had no passports for them. I went to searching the internet for a company that expedited passports and found RUSHMYPASSPORT. I contact the customer service department to get the details and started the process of getting my kids passports. I sent the paperwork off with the required documents via Fed-Ex and my personal courier Merciline Ofelin made the magic happen. I want to extend out a special thanks to Merciline because I feel like I had a close friend working on the other end of the passport process where I couldn't be. I am beyond impressed with Rush my Passport and my courier Merciline Ofelin and would recommend them to anyone who needs a passport expedited asap!!! Thank you!!
